communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- contracts/agreements, memorandums, plans, completion documents, and other related documents pertaining to debris removal  and disaster waste management in Puerto Rico throughout recovery from Hurricane Maria

- data related to debris removal for Hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico, including but not limited to quantities of removal per municipality

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jesann Gonzalez Cruz

title: Hurricane Maria Disaster Waste Management - EPA

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- data related to disaster waste response to Hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico, including but not limited to any geospatial data. 

- Contracts/agreements, memorandums, reports and all documents related to the EPA's response to Puerto Rico's Hurricane Maria disaster waste. 

- EPA assessment reports of rural, “non-PRASA” (Non-Puerto Rico Aqueduct and Sewer Authority) drinking water systems in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria

I have located an EPA source at the following link, but the information is only briefly summarized: https://response.epa.gov/site/site_profile.aspx?site_id=12403

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jesann Gonzalez Cruz

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Disneyland Calls for Service/Arrests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) All calls for service to Disneyland Resort, California Adventure Park, and/or Downtown Disney District between the dates of January 2023 through when this request is processed. 

2) All, if any, arrest records involving individuals that were in either Disneyland Resort, California Adventure Park, or Downtown Disney District at time of arrest between the dates of January 2023 to when this request is processed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Skylar Ferguson
